publicationStmt.p: This is an XML-TEI markup of the original publications by SIL Mexico for the purposes of: archival and for the creation of a body of Mixtepec-Mixtec language resources (LR) (ISO: mix). Encoded documents used with the permission of original authors.

sourceDesc.bibl: Ntantuku ichi Beckmann, Gisela; Nieves, María M.. 2007. (2nd ed.). Instituto Lingüístico de Verano, A.C. Tlalpan, D.F., México Obtained from:

textDesc.channel: @mode:'m' means that there are multiple ways of utilising this document which is of the 'pedigogical-interactive' category, which are the combination of the following: reading it's written descriptions/instructions; looking at the mazes in the imgs; excercises are completed by drawing the line through the path in the maze imgs;
textDesc.derivation: this document is labeled "original" because the XML-TEI markup of it's contents have not made any alterations to the original content;

normalization.ab: 2018-02-10Spelling of lexical items which in the old orthography were homographs and which have been changed according to updated orthographic principles as per ../Mille/GUIA_ORTOGRAFICA_PRELIMINAR_Short_version.xml

editorialDecl.ab:
In one instance the norm in addition to the resp="#TS" is used to include the correct value of the word which is determined to be an editorial error by the speaker consultant Tisu'ma Salazar. This will remain in this form until I can consult with one of the original editors of the document as to whether:
he is entirely correct and it was a mispelling
(or) this is a sub-dialectal variant native to Yucunani or at least Tisu's socio-linguistic circle
(or) Tisu is incorrect

spanGrp.span: This dog is looking at the path, he's going to get the tortillas that are inside.
Este perro está mirando el camino, va a obtener las tortillas que estan adentro.
Draw a line for the dog to walk through.
Dibuja una linea para el perro caminar.
It (animal) goes to where the tortillas are.
Va a dónde estan las torillas.
This ant came out looking for something to eat and he found a fruit tree.
Esta hormiga salió buscando algo a comer y encontré algo en un árbol frutal.
Draw a path that this ant should go on to where the small fruit are.
Dibuja una linea por cual la hormiga caminar a dónde estan la fruta pequeña.
Here you have to look for path so that you can get to everything here on this path.
Aquí tienes que buscar el camino para que llegues hasta todo en este camino.
You have to enter this path and then you have to come out on the other side.
Tienes que entrar este camino y tienes que salir al otro lado.
Draw a line up to the end of the path.
Draw a line up to where the path ends.
Dibuja una linea al final del camino.
Dibuja una linea a dónde fine el camino.
You have to enter this path and then you have to come out on the other side.
Tienes que entrar este camino y tienes que salir al otro lado.
Draw a line up to the end of the path.
Draw a line up to where the path ends.
Dibuja una linea al final del camino.
Dibuja una linea a dónde fine el camino.
Here you have to look for the way to enter in order to collect all of your eggs.
Aquí tienes que buscar la manera a entrar para que recogas todos tus huevos.
And now come out on your right.
Y ahora sal a tu derecha.
Can the little fish hide from the big fish.
¿Puede el pescado pequeño esconder del pescado grande?
Draw a line from the side where you enter and the side where you come out.
Dibuja una linea de dónde entras y el lado dónde sales.
You have to enter this path and then you have to come out on the other side.
Tienes que entrar este camino y tienes que salir al otro lado.
Draw a line up to wher the path will end.
Dibuja una linea a dónde va a terminar el camino.
